channel.title: Help would be awesome
channel.description:
Ok, i need a hoster; as long as it is 18+ hours it will be fine......the hoster will get admin on the server(server must not be hamachi normal hosting only) Please have a good connection or fast computer if u wish to host
And can anyone make my server a a client? I'm not asking because i'm lazy it's because i have tried making a client on many occausions and when i make it; the picture either doesn't show up or i get compiling error so i finally just gave up.

item.title: Help would be awesome
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

9d n 1 n e:

gtfo wow read the rules stop posting in the server help section. seriously getting annoying.

Read the rules as well. We spell things out (although not enforced). And no flaming.

i hit u i:

…what do u mean stop…this is my first post in this section, and it involves helping…

Hosting is a minor part of helping, but not allowed.

Read full topic
